alert.note: Alert for Inland Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:05PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fort Bend, north central Brazoria and southwestern Harris Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Neartown / Montrose, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Pearland, Sugar Land, Missouri City, Stafford, Bellaire, West University Place, northwestern Manvel, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Midtown Houston, Downtown Houston, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Greater Heights, Fresno, Mission Bend, Neartown / Montrose, Town West, Greater Hobby Area and Memorial Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
